page.title: 16Transport in Curdridge.
page.content: Botley Railway Station is situated in Curdridge. The line is a loop line between Eastleigh and Fareham, but connections can be made easily to anywhere in the country. Only two bus services run through Curdridge - 75 between Southampton and Fareham, and 75A between Southampton and Bishops Waltham. The 75 passes through Curdridge 6 times a day, and the 75A 4 times a day. Parents at Curdridge Primary School were asked how often they used public transport. They responded: {NEVER }XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX {SOMETIMES }XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX {OFTEN } X Number of cars owned by each family: {1 }xxxxxxxxxxx {2 }xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx {3 } xx One family did not own {4 } x a car.
